author: Seattle Times staff
title: Coming up: Events beyond Seattle
text:
Clamshell Railroad Days, July 18-19, Ilwaco. 360-642-3446 or columbiapacificheritagemuseum.com . 
San Juan Island Lavender Festival, July 18-19, San Juan Island. 866-819-1911 or pelindabalavender.com . 
Camas Days Celebration, July 24-25, Camas. cwchamber.com/cwdata . 
Multisport Summer Festival, July 24-26, Cle Elum. suncadiaresort.com/multisport . 
Willapa Harbor Festival, July 31-Aug. 2, Raymond. 360-942-5419 or willapaharbor.org . 
Scottish Highland Games, Aug. 1, Spokane Valley. 509-922-3661 or spokanehighlandgames.org . 
Doe Bay Festival, Aug. 6-10, Doe Bay Resort, Orcas Island. doebayfest.com . 
Orcas Island Chamber Music Festival, Aug. 6-22, Eastsound. 360-376-6636 or oicmf.org . 
Vancouver Brewfest, Aug. 7-9, Vancouver, Wash.. vancouverbrewfest.com . Oregon 
Oregon Bach Festival, July 9, Eugene. hultcenter.org . 
Hell’s Canyon Motorcycle Rally, July 9-13, Baker City. 503) 770-0799 or hellscanyonrally.com . 
McKenzie River Lavender Festival, July 10, Springfield. oregonlavenderdestinations.com . 
Oregon Country Fair, July 10-12, Veneta. oregoncountryfair.org . 
Bowlby Bash, July 11, Enterprise. 541-398-0189 or bowlbybash.org . 
Coburg Golden Years Festival, July 17-19, Coburg. 541-343-9875 or coburggoldenyears.com . 
North Bend July Jubilee, July 17-18, North Bend. 800-472-9176 or julyjubilee.com . 
Sherwood Robin Hood Festival, July 17-18, Sherwood. 503-625-4233 or robinhoodfestival.org . 
Salem Art Fair & Festival, July 17-19, Salem. 503-581-2228 or salemart.org . 
Chief Joseph Days, July 21-26, Joseph. 541-432-1015 or chiefjosephdays.com/rodeo . 
Oregon Brewers Festival, July 22-26, Portland. oregonbrewfest.com . 
Mill-Luck Salmon Celebration, Sept. 12-13, North Bend. 800-953-4800 or themillcasino.com . Idaho 
Snake River Stampede, July 14-18, Nampa. snakeriverstampede.com . 
Roseberry Summer Music Festival, July 16-18, Donnelly. thesummermusicfestival.com . 
Art on the Green, July 31-Aug. 2, Coeur d’Alene. artonthegreencda.com . 
Yellow Pine Music and Harmonica Festival, July 31-Aug. 1, Yellow Pine. yellowpinemusicandharmonicafestival.org . 
Magic Valley Beer Festival, Aug. 1, Twin Falls. 208-410-1836 or magicvalleybeerfestival.com . British Columbia 
Whistler Children’s Festival, July 10-12, Whistler. whistlerartscouncil.com 
Nanaimo Dragon Boat Festival, July 10-12, Nanaimo. nanaimodragonboat.com . 
Atlin Arts & Music Festival, July 10-12, Atlin. 867-335-1428 or atlinfestival.ca . 
Kimberly Annual Julyfest, July 17-19, Kimberly. kimberleyjulyfest.com . 
Chemainus Bluegrass Festival, July 18-19, Chemainus. chemainusbluegrass.com . 
Country Fest, July 25-26, Sun Peaks. sunpeaksresort.com . 
Squamish Days Logger Sports Festival, July 30-Aug. 3, Squamish. 866-333-2010 or squamishdays.ca . 
Alert Bay Seafest & Musicfest — Medieval Times, July 31-Aug. 2, Alert Bay. alertbayseafest.com . Send listings at least a month in advance to travelcalendar@seattletimes.com or to Jeff Albertson, The Seattle Times, P.O. Box 70, Seattle, WA 98111.
